comment._content: I like how the same drum is played by the group.

comment.author: 37403693@N05
comment._content: ...That looks like Stoney Creek Singers!!!.. They're outta NC I believe..

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/37403693@N05] Thank you for the comment, mvskoke_creek! I'll try to retrieve a positive ID for the group featured in this image from the Smithsonian's National Museum of the American Indian. In the meantime, I just looked up the Stoney Creek Singers, here's a video of that group performing live: www.youtube.com/watch?v=9BIPhjjxnfU. Sincerely, Susannah Smithsonian Institution Archives
